attributes.action: Stop Main Careers Denying Access for Financial Gain through the CSA (Cash Convertors)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Main Careers 98% Mothers, i am not biased, that currently deny access, without due course, in doing so the CSA (Cash Convertors) increases the amount a Non Main Career has to pay by as much as 100%.

The legislation should turn around and encourge contact / access, for fincial gain not make Non Main Careers that want to be apart of their childs life outcast of society.

This encourages Main Careers to deny access, Please vote to change this biased, unfair legislation.
